title: Patch Notes
content: ing to Player 2 could lead to the avatar being unable to rest or fast travel if, before the resurrection, the avatar was in a prison cell after being arrested. The illithid power Mind Sanctuary now consumes resources when consuming potions. Additionally, potions can be used within the Mind Sanctuary nexus if there is only one Action available. Fixed the Gibus of the Worshipful Servant not generating Momentum at the start of combat. Fixed a bug causing Dark Urge characters to get renamed after us
